text: The Chevrolet Trailblazer is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by Chevrolet since 2020. == History and Features == The Chevrolet Trailblazer was shown at the 18th Shanghai International Automobile Industry Exhibition alongside the Chevrolet Tracker that replaced the Trax while the Trailblazer will be sold in developed markets the Tracker will be sold in emerging markets. It was then launched in the North American market at the the Los Angeles Auto Show in November 2019 and was put on sale in early 2020 as a 2021 model."2021 Chevrolet Trailblazer Priced at Under $20k" from GM Authority (November 21, 2019) its made in Incheon South Korea while for the Chinese market its made in Yantai by SAIC-GM (which is a joint venture between General Motors and SAIC Motor) has a 1.2 and 1.3 liter turbo petrol engines with a 9-speed automatic transmission (availiable in AWD only) and CVT transmission (avaliable in FWD only) it was improved in 2024. == Markets == The Chevrolet Trailblazer is currently sold in North America China South Korea. and Philipines. == References == Trailblazer Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Chevrolet Trailblazer (crossover)
